task.name: importgmrt
task.shortdescription: Convert a UVFITS file to a CASA visibility data set
task.description: Convert a GRMT FITS file to a CASA visiblity data set. Also read GMRT flag file(s) and flag data based on the contents of the files.

param.name: fitsfile
param.shortdescription: Name of input UV FITS file
param.description:
Name of input UV FITS file Default: none
Example: fitsimage='3C273XC1.fits'

param.name: flagfile
param.shortdescription: List of files containing flagging information.
param.description:
List of files containing flagging information. Default: none
Examples: flagfile='3c273XC1.flag' flagfile=['3c273Cc1_1.flag','3c273Cc2_1.flag',']

param.name: vis
param.description:
Name of input visibility file Default: none
Example: vis='ngc5921.ms'

task.example: FOR MORE INFORMATION, SEE THE TASK PAGES OF IMPORTGMRT IN CASA DOCS: https://casa.nrao.edu/casadocs/
